description: This solicitation contains a mandatory site visit due to the laboratories used to analyze biological specimens.
full_summary:
# Cleaning Services for CFIA’s Dartmouth Lab

## Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: 2023-01177
* Amendment Number: 3
* Tender Closing Date: July 31, 2023, 16:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

## Service Information

* UNSPSC Code: *76110000 (Cleaning and Janitorial Services)
* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: Nova Scotia

## Contract Information

* Contracting Entity: Canadian Food Inspection Agency
* Address: 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0Y9, Canada
* Contact Name: Peter Vinh
* Contact Email: peter.vinh@inspection.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (343) 573-4194

## Tender Description

This solicitation contains a mandatory site visit. Interested bidders are required to review the Request for Proposal for all details. Updates to the solicitation include:

* Update to the mandatory site visit date and time
* Addition of clarifications to the Questions and Answers section

## Supporting Documents

The following documents are available for download:

* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Addendum 1 (2023-01177)
* Addendum 2 (2023-01177)
* RFP Amendment 01
* RFP Amendment 02

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Note: All schedules and amendments must be reviewed and incorporated into the bid package. [1]
